remarks: The number of numbers in a given residue class in a finite set of integers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2016.)
statement:
hashdvds.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
hashdvds.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ZZ ) $.
hashdvds.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( ZZ>= ` ( A - 1 ) ) ) $.
hashdvds.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ZZ ) $.
hashdvds $p |- ( ph -> ( # ` { x e. ( A ... B ) | N || ( x - C ) } ) = ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - C ) / N ) ) - ( |_ ` ( ( ( A - 1 ) - C ) / N ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d N x $.
